PatchEverything:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
PatchEverything:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

PatchEverything:BlasphemyRunRelic.NAME: Blasphemy
DESCRIPTIONS: Start combat in Divinity and die next turn. Starter Defends cannot be added to your deck. Grants bonus card draw based on the act number.

PatchEverything:CreativeAIRelic.NAME: Creative AI
DESCRIPTIONS: Replace 1 base card draw with a random power card each turn.
